hackathon-description-text: Join other mobile and IoT developers in building
hackathon-eligibility:
- Individuals over 18 and teams up to 5 people
- Must be present at hackathon venue for judging
hackathon-requirements: Get creative! Post a description, photos, video demo, links, etc.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Present your hack at the IoT Stream Conference on April 23.
$200 Amazon gift card for each team member (up to 5)
$100 Amazon gift card for each team member (up to 5)
$25 gift card for each team member (up to 5)
$200 gift card for each team member (up to 5)
$100 gift card for each team mebmer (up to 5)
$25 gift card for each team member (up to 5)
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: PubNub Best Hack from Team that Didn't Have Access to the Kegerator
